Text: brilliant! Must say, I was a bit disappointed with "the big reveal" but still hanging on to see how it all ties together.  I am in your debt, thank you Lord whaleoil!

Anyone typing in Torchwood Miracle Day is not going to find this upload because of the "Mracle" typo. (I finally found it by just typing in just Torchwood.) I don't know how WOBF can fix it. Maybe WOBF knows if he is allowed to edit once something is uploaded. Aside from that, thank you for the fine quality uploads on this series thus far.
